description:
Hello Friends,

The job market is challenging...but with the right strategies you can land your dream job. Let me show you how! My program is Certified by the Workforce Investment Board (WIB). This course will assist job seekers with Interview Skills, Resume Tips, Linkedin fundamentals, and Social Media Strategies. Learn the best practices for a successful job search & interview! Includes pdf downloads of example resumes, cover letters, and elevator speeches.

  • 18 lectures and over 90 mins of video content.
  • PDF Downloads & Worksheets
  • Understand how to "stand out" from all of your competition.
  • Learn the process to ace your interview.
  • Learn to make Social Media work for you...not against you.
  • and much much more...
title: Real World Job Hunt: Strategies that get you Hired!
